original_text: I beseech you, brethren, (ye know the house of Stephanas, that it is the firstfruits of Achaia, and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints,)
korean_text: 형제들아 스데바나의 집은 곧 아가야의 첫 열매요 또 성도 섬기기로 작정한 줄을 너희가 아는지라 내가 너희를 권하노니

sentences.original_text: ye know the house of Stephanas,
that it is the firstfruits of Achaia,
and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 성도들의 섬기는 일에 전념하였음을
